Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Biden and Obama allowed grown men in restrooms with little girls.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of missing children that Trump has rescued (300) as there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Biden and Obama allowed grown men in restrooms with little girls.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption by conflating accommodations for transgender students with child molestation.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the accusation against Biden and Obama allowing grown men in restrooms with little girls stems from a misinterpretation of the Obama-era guidance on transgender students' rights.
